mathiwaranayata wada wadagath wanne daruwange usas pela wibhagaya bawin eyata badhawana se mathiwarana raswim pelapali pawathwima shri lanka nidahas pakshaya kisiseth anumatha nokarana bawa ema pakshaye bhandagarika, yauwana katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathi dalas alahapperuma mahatha pawasayi.amathiwaraya me bawa pawasuwe usas pela wibhagayata peni sitina daruwanta badha ella wana paridi ratha pelapali yamin shabda wikashana yanthra bhawitha nokarana lesa mathiwarana komasariswaraya di thibu niyogayata patahaniwa uuwa palathe shri lanka nidahas paksha apekshakayaku katayuthu kara athi bawata shri lanka nidahas paksha mulasthana shrawanagaraye eeye (7) pawathi wishesha madhya hamuwe di madhyawediyaku mathukala prashnayakata pilithuru demini.mewani siduwimak mangin yam apekshakayaku mathiwarana nithi kadakara athi nam ee sambandhayen pakshaya washayen soya bala awashya piyawara ganna bawath, shri lanka nidahas pakshaya mathiwarana komasariswarayage niyoga saha upades anuwa katayuthu kirimata sama witama bandi sitina bawath wadiduratath pawasiya.
